message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000.  I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,000 is simply too low for me.  Considering the value of this product to you, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a good deal.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $11,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $10,800 as a final compromise. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this deal happen.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,800 is still a bit higher than I'd like to pay. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but that's my absolute limit. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at $10,650.
